Ball - Class in model
This is an abstract Ball class which consists of an abstract method (makeBall) that must be implemented by its subclass if its subclass is not abstract class.

Brick - Class in model
This is an abstract Brick class which consists of two abstract methods (makeBrickFace and getBrick) that must be implemented by its subclass if its subclass is not abstract class.
